description: React component for handling OAuth callback flow for Confluence integration in a Next.js application. It manages URL parameters to determine success or failure, displays alerts, and redirects accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main exported React component wrapping inner content with Suspense for loading state.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component handling OAuth callback logic, URL parameter parsing, state management, and UI rendering.
